update.description:
**** 1.8.5 **** * Fixed a bug with the alert window that would cause it to steal focus from the running application.
**** 1.8.4 **** * Minor bug fixes.
**** 1.8 **** * Alert sound can now be customized. Just pick the mp3 file that you want to play via the sound manager window (found through the config window). * Alert window bug fixes. * Architecture of the app has been completely redesigned. * Removed failed connection alert and replaced it with a gray "Offline" icon.
